horse.non-mayo: This is not mayonnaise, @item. I remember.
horse.no-payment: I accept payment in mayonnaise only.
lines.2: Are we really going mining again?
lines.4: You know I have opinions, right?
lines.7: You call this a path layout?
lines.8: Have we considered more carrots in the budget?
lines.11: If you give me mayo, I might forgive your steering.
lines.12: Horsing around is my full-time job.
lines.13: These horseshoes aren't just for show.
lines.14: Did you forget to brush me again? Thought so.
lines.15: I'm faster with snacks; science proves it.
lines.16: Another scenic tour of the same five tiles?
lines.17: My tail swish is a language. Learn it.
lines.18: We passing Robin's? I need a stable upgrade.
lines.19: Galloping builds character. Yours, not mine.
lines.20: I could outrun Pam's bus. Probably.
lines.21: If you see Shane, tell him I want pizza crusts.
lines.22: I deserve a hat too, you know.
lines.23: Let's avoid slimes; they ruin my mane.
lines.24: You steer; I'll provide the charisma.
lines.25: I neigh-say this plan, but let's roll.
lines.26: Reminder: carrots beat coffee every time.
lines.27: Don't make me file a union complaint.
lines.28: I'm majestic and I know it.
lines.29: If I win a race, I get double hay.
lines.30: Cue the heroic soundtrack when we gallop.
